page.title: 07Hobbies in Patchway
page.content: I have two hobbies. One of them is computer programming. The language I use is{BASIC}which means Beginners All Purpose Symbolic Instruction Code. There are other languages such as{ {PILOT FORTH}and{MACHINE CODE}. My other hobby is vintage motoring. I am a junior member of the{Bristol {Austin 7 Club}. An Austin 7 is a motorcar built in the vintage period 1920-1935. I keep Koi carp. They are a breed of Japanese and German carp. They feed out of your hand. They can live to be two hundred years old and grow up to be four foot long. Their colours vary. I have fourteen of them. Some people think they're all slimy, but I stroke them all the time and they feel very fragile. I have entered some of my fish in shows and have got a second and a third placing.
